div.p:
Curia Gilde tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene vto die mensis octobris Anno Domini
Mmo CCCCmo quinquagesimo tercio / Per Johannem de Marr' prepositum eiusdem burgi
Quo die Ricardus Kintor continuatums fuit in officio decani gilde pro vno anno

div.head: Electi pro communi consilio .
div.p:
Johannes de fife
Johannes de scrogs pater
Johannes de scrogs filius
Andreas meignes
Andreas culane
Thomas blyndseil
Matheus fichet
Duncanus de clat
Macolmus de forbes
Andreas tulidef
Johannes voket pater
Johannes voket filius
Andreas ayncroft
Robertus de camera
Willelmus scherar'
Robertus blyndseil
Johannes gray
Willelmus Rolland
Willelmus voket
Johannes henrison' culane
Johannes howison'
Dauid meignes
Alexander blyndseil
Robertus Wormot
Alexander Kintor
Stephanus Johnson'
Thomas de camera

Item it was avisit statute and ordanit be the said counsaile for the vphalding
and eikyng of goddis seruice to be done in the parroche kirk of this burgh'
that al and sindri chaplanys the quhilkis ar has feft altaris or that h
ar feit be worthi men of the toune sal cum daili and do divyne seruice that
is to say matynys hiemess' and evinsang / And give ony of thaim absentis him
fra three of the said howris continuali / thai salbe excludit and expellit that
thai sal noght' syng mess' within the said kirk for a yher' / bot give thai haue
f sufficient excusacion' quhilkis be sene Resonable' to the Aldirman and to the
correctour' of the queir' / And the feft chaplanys that beis absent as said is
sal tyne attour' thair' chaplanijs and the Aldirman sal dispone thar'apon be
avis' of the commoune counsaile .

Curia gilde tenta in pretorio per prepositum et decanum gilde Ricardum Kintor xix die mensis
octobris Anno Domini Mmo CCCCmo quinquagesimo tercio . //

This is the ansuer' of the commoune counsaile and diuers' merchandis brethir' of
the gilde of this burgh' diuisit and concludit to to be giffin to John' of
fife and his procuratouris til his clame of xl lib' be ane obligacion of
the tounes / and of xviij lib' acht' til him as he allegis othir' waijs
be the communytee / that sen the said John' of fife sen the date of
the said obligacion diuers' tymes and yheris has bene Aldirman
and had handillyng and governance of the commoune gudez of this
burgh' // of the quhilkis thai presume / that thair' Remanys yheit in his
handis // that may be payment for the said clames // thai will with'
avis' of him self cheis' a certane of vnsuspect' persounes to heir' his
acomptis and give it be paijt in his hand lat him be content / and
give it be noght' in his hand / the toune sal content him and Redeme
the said obligacion in al gudeli haste

Item eodem die Johannes de Scrogs filius et Johannes howison' electi fuerunt'
in magistros fabrice ecclesie parrochalis parrochialis beati nicholaij huius burgi pro vno anno .

The xj dai of the moneth' of Januar' the yher' of liij The Aldirman and consale
comon' ordanit at na qu querte of beer' besald derrar' than iij d' vndir
the pan' of forfautyng of the beer' and the vnlaw of viij s'

Curia gilde tenta per prepositum et decanum gilde primo die mensis februarij Anno
Domini et cetera liijo

Quo die Johannes colbane confessus fuit forisstallacionem pellium / et conuictus fuit de forisstallacione
correorum et de alijs quitus plegio .

xxvjto die Aprilis Anno et cetera liiijto coram preposito et balliuis consulibus huius burgi
comparuerunt Johannes petirson' magister sub deo cuiusdam nauis / petrus Wijss' et
cornelius henricson' naute de newport in flandria / ex vna et Dauid Dun
magistrum cuiusdam nauis et thomam broisour' et Willelmum Dun partibus ex altera

xxijo die mensis' Maij Anno quo supra / probi viri de consilio huius burgi promiserunt Johanni
de marr' preposito et custumario regis de salmonis debitis quod seruabunt ipsum indempnem
de custuma salmonum exportatorum per gallicos / ex eo quod ijdem consules pretendunt
presumunt et alligant quod dicti gallici tenentur soluere custumam salmonum

It is is grantyt be the Aldirman and the mast part of the commone consaile til ser
henry hervy for this yeris seruice in the kirke til his fee twenty merkis of the
vsuale monee of scotlande and gif the aldirman and the consaile may get ony
seruice till him in the meyne tyme' that sal be alowit to the saide ser henry in
the forsaide twenty merkis and the saide ser henry is oblist to ramayn for the saide
fee with ws yerely bot gif it happin him to be benefiiste in ony vthir' place and
we oblist to pay him that fee yerly quhil he be benefiiste as saide is

The samyn day the aldirman and consaile has giffin to Johne' of hill the office of
the forstary of wode and myris of this burgh' for a yer' and for the execucione
of the saide office the saide Johne has sworne the bodely athe

The samyn day has grauntyt the said' aldirman and consaile to Johne' crukschanke the
seruice of the keping of the orlage for this yer' and til hafe til his fee for the
seruice of it xl s' and has sworne the gret athe to do his diligent besynes to
the keping of it /

p.hi:
Burgenses et confratres Gilde facti tempore prepositure Johannis de Marr'
Anno Domini millesimo CCCCmo quinquagesimo tercio .

div.p:
Johannes Stewart ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
ex eo quod Agnetem filiam et heredem quondam gilberti de turyne disponsauit pro prestitit
solitum Juramentum dedit que in alba bursa v s'

Ranaldus talyhour qui prius fuit burgensis / receptus fuit in confratrem gilde pro xl s'
quos consilium concessit Willelmo banerman confratri gilde in suum releuamen et cetera

Andreas de Murrave / de consensu consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde pro v lib' / soluendis quinquaginta solidis in manibus / et residuo in reventu
suo de prucia / quas quinque libras consilium concessit pro emendis tabulis ad
in prucia ad reparacionem campanile beati Nicholai de Abirdene .
Thomas Alaneson' receptus fuit racione paterne libertatis in burgensem et confratrem gilde pro v s'
Matheus Culane racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem pro v s'

Curia Gilde tenta per Andream Meignes quarto die mensis octobris Anno Domini Mmo
CCCCmo quinquagesimo quarto .

Quo die Ricardus Kintor continuatus fuit in officio decanatus gilde pro isto anno
qui solitum prestitit Juramentum et cetera

div.head: Commune consilium
div.p:
Johannes de marr'
- Johannes de fife
Johannes de scrogs pater
Johannes de scrogs filius
Alexander de camera
Willelmus scherar'
+ Andreas culane
Duncane of clat
Matheus fichet
thomas blyndseil
+ Johannes voket pater
+ Andreas ayncroft
+ Andreas Alaneson'
+ Murthacus glastre
| Macolmus blyndseil forbes
Robertus blyndseil
+ Johannes voket filius
+ Alexander Kintor
Johannes Kintor
Dauid meignes
patricius badenach'
+ Robertus Wormot
+ Stephanus Johnson'
+ Willelmus voket
+ Willelmus Rolland'
Edmundus louson'
Dauid symson'

Item eodem die consilium consensijt consensit decreuit et ordinauit quod eligantur quinque probi
viri de consilio / qui habeant Inquirere et reformare omnes defectus circa
officium et seruicium ecclesie / et cappellanorum / et isti quinque persone habebunt plenam
potestatem tocius communjs consilij / tam in statutis faciendis quam in delinquentibus
puniri faciendis / Et consilium promisit de Rato / Et electi fuerunt
ad hoc
Johannes de fife
Johannes de marr'
Johannes de scrogs pater
Johannes scrogs filius
Matheus fichet

Preterea consilium decreuit quod eedem persone habebunt Inquirere avisare et ordinare
super omnibus communibus operacionibus huius burgi / et prepositus et decanus gilde operare
facient secundum eorum avisiamentum et cetera // Et predicte persone vna cum
patricio badenach' Johanne howison' et Alexandro blyndseil / audient omniam computa
officiariorum preteritorum

Vndecimo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra / It was ordanit be the Aldirman and
Counsaile for the commoune proffit of this burgh' / that al the persounes bath' men
and wemen / the quhilkis ar sclaunderit of spillyng of the merkate / sal forber'
and cum noght' in the merkate vndir the payne of prisounyng the twa first daijs
that thai be fundin in the merkate / and the third dai of banysing of the toune
but othir Remissioune /
Curia gilde tenta per prepositum et decanum gilde xvto die mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

Quo die Johannes fauside accusatus de tannacione et operacione manu propria posuit
se in voluntate prepositi et decani gilde /
Item Johannes club similiter posuit se in voluntate eadem causa .
Item Johannes stokkar Willelmus cuntlace similiter posuit se in voluntate
Item Willelmus cuntlace Willelmus michaelson' similiter posuit se in voluntate
Item Willelmus michaelson' similiter posuit se in voluntate
Item Willelmus Ranyson' similiter posuit se in voluntate

xvijmo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera lvto / Commune consilium concessit Donaldo
de fife qui alias captus fuit in Anglia / pro relevamine et redempcione suis
vnu ad recipiendum vnam habilem personam quem ipse duxerit presentandum in burgensem
et confratrem gilde huius burgi .

Summa totalis oneracionis computi Duncani de clat decani gilde de Anno Domini
et cetera ljmo tempore videlicet prepositure Johannis de fife Scrogs jC xlvj lib' xij s' ij d'

superexpendit Summa totalis expensarum eiusdem particulariter examinatarum super computum et allocatarum
per auditores jC xlvj lib' xix s' x d' / Et sic superexpendit vij s' viij d'

Summa totalis oneracionis prefati Duncani de anno Domini et cetera lijo videlicet tempore prepositure
Johannis de fife jC xlix lib' xvij s' x d'

superexpendit Summa totalis expensarum eiusdem particulariter examinatarum vt supra jC lj lib'
xiiij s' iiij d' / Et sic superexpendit computans xxxvj s' vj d'

Item memorandum quod facto computo Johannis de scrogs' filij prepositi supradicti
tam de receptis per eum a dicto decano quam de finibus officij sui ipse debet
debet de claro communitati xxix s' / Et restant in manibus eiusdem
Johannis de scrogs de grissomis aquarum et terrarum huius burgi receptus per eum
ex assedacione facta tempore suo xj lib' x s' / Inde allocat' eidem
pro moneta furata vt asserit iij lib' / Et sic restant de claro in
manibus suis viij lib' x s'
restant
debet Summa huius debiti per Johannem de Scrogs supradictum ix li' xix s'

Introitus cuiusdam nauis quam sub deo gubernat hans lubek vij die mensis Augusti Anno et ut supra lvo
In primis v lasta farrine

Johannes patrikson pistor ex gracia consilij receptus fuit ex eo d quod disponsauit filiam Walteri de
quhite confratris gilde / prestito solito Juramento .

Willelmus matelande carpentarius ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem
pro x s' quos qui dabantur patricio Wrych' pro elimosina

The xvj dai of februar' the yher' forsaid It was ordanit be the hale counsail
that John' stephinson' suld be the feest of the purificacion of our' ladi next
tocum / freith' bryng hame and deliuer to John' of fife his obligacion the quhilk
he send within with' him in his furthiryng to londone / or ellis he sal pay
him alsmekil be his ath' as he tuke in londone apon his obligacion or apon
the traiste of it / the quhilkis
